txt.en: 'You have done a great many things for the people of the Sutcrofts, [placeholder]. I wish to reward your tenacity with a symbol of our appreciation.\n\n'On the table there is a pendant, a pendant of the Sutcrofts. Take it, for you have earned it most thoroughly.'

'Treasure that as a reminder of all you have done for the people of the Sutcrofts.

'We must rebuild in wake of this attack, but rest assured, our strength will never waver, and no Orc will ever claim these lands again!

'Glory for Rohan... may your courage never falter!'
Fastred wishes to speak with you about your victories in the Sutcrofts, and the great work you have done for the safety of his people.
The delicate pendant has beautiful etchings of wheat wreathing a bold red gemstone... a true token of the Sutcrofts
The pendant can be found on a table next to Fastred inside the Mead Hall of Snowbourn.
Fastred can be found inside the Mead Hall of Snowbourn.\n\nYou should speak again with Fastred.
